item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Which year: guess which year each photo was taken (319 points | 116 comments)
2. Gemma 3 QAT Models: Bringing AI to Consumer GPUs (10 points | 1 comment)
3. 100 Years to Solve an Integral (2020) (145 points | 33 comments)
4. Raspberry Pi Lidar Scanner (509 points | 145 comments)
5. Let's give PRO/VENIX a barely adequate, pre-C89 TCP/IP stack, featuring Slirp-CK (42 points | 2 comments)
6. Show HN: I built an AI that turns GitHub codebases into easy tutorials (404 points | 73 comments)
7. Novel color via stimulation of individual photoreceptors at population scale (128 points | 52 comments)
8. Pretty State Machine Patterns in Rust (2016) (96 points | 28 comments)
9. Librarians are dangerous (552 points | 526 comments)
10. Attention Spans for Math and Stories (2019) (17 points | 2 comments)
11. Claude Code: Best practices for agentic coding (488 points | 211 comments)
12. First baby born in UK to woman with transplanted womb (270 points | 266 comments)
13. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (352 points | 288 comments)
14. Everyone knows your location, Part 2: try it yourself and share the results (174 points | 36 comments)
15. Layered Design in Go (84 points | 8 comments)
16. A unique sound alleviates motion sickness (160 points | 74 comments)
17. Silicon Valley crosswalk buttons apparently hacked to imitate Musk, Zuck voices (387 points | 114 comments)
18. Welcome to the Era of Experience [pdf] (84 points | 31 comments)
19. Ssl.com: DCV bypass and issue fake certificates for any MX hostname (193 points | 56 comments)
20. Electromagnetism as a Purely Geometric Theory (117 points | 39 comments)
21. Don't force your kids to do math (178 points | 248 comments)
22. Ask HN: How do you talk about past jobs you regret in interviews (9 points | 13 comments)
23. Eccfrog512ck2: An Enhanced 512-Bit Weierstrass Elliptic Curve [pdf] (27 points | 5 comments)
24. The Web Is Broken – Botnet Part 2 (360 points | 222 comments)
25. Packing Input Frame Context in Next-Frame Prediction Models for Video Generation (258 points | 26 comments)
26. Models of Ice Skating for the Development of Robotic Ice Skating Gaits [pdf] (2020) (11 points | 2 comments)
27. Restoring the Galaxian3 Theatre 6, 1992 six player arcade machine (220 points | 48 comments)
28. An image of the Australian desert illuminates satellite pollution (150 points | 85 comments)
29. Show HN: Lit.money – Ethically designed to be a private, simple way to see money (17 points | 19 comments)
30. The Icelandic Voting System (2024) (111 points | 102 comments)
